long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn Your Browsing into Earnings with Datacy!
Datacy is a free Chrome extension that lets you monetize your online data easily and ethically. By sharing your anonymized browsing behavior, you help brands understand consumers and shape future innovation while earning!


Why Choose Datacy?
- Earn Seamlessly: Get paid for your online activities without changing your browsing habits.
- Full Control: Decide what data you share and which brands to restrict. Decide when to pause or delete collection anytime. 
- Privacy First: Your data is anonymized, aggregated and shared only when matched with a brand community..
- Transparent Tracking: View collected data and earnings directly from your dashboard.


How It Works:
- Install Datacy: Add the extension from the Chrome Web Store and set up your account.
- Browse as Usual: Use Chrome on your desktop to collect as you browse, watch, or shop!
- Get Matched: Datacy matches your anonymized data with brands looking for specific consumer behaviors. The more your activities align with what brands are seeking, the more likely you will be matched. 
- Earn: You earn when youâ€™re matched with a brand community. The more communities you're part of, the higher your earning potential!


Key Features:
- Easy setup and free.
- Check your earnings and collection in one integrated dashboard.
- Withdraw your earnings securely through PayPal or Stripe.


For more details, visit our FAQs page at https://datacy.com/consumer/faq.
